definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

definition: unable to restrain one's anger (idiom); in a towering rage
stamp with fury/fly into a rage
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
to fly into a rage out of humiliation/to be ashamed into anger (idiom)
how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
lit. to slap the table and stand up (idiom); fig. at the end of one's tether/unable to take it any more
to suddenly change color showing displeasure, bewilderment etc
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 呵斥[he1 chi4]
